amendment.description: Amendment stops the government from enforcing the ban on agencies funded by the Department of Defense Appropriations bill from being forced to comply with section 526 relating to DOD's plans to buy and develop coal-based or coal-to-liquids jet fuel.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to enforce section 526 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
